sqlMap.select:
/* ID : bkLabel.getBkLabelCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TB_SYS_BKLABEL
BK_LABEL_ID BK_DEVICE LAST_WORKER LIKE CONCAT('%', #findText#, '%')
FROM_CONDITION >= #findFromCondition#
END_CONDITION <= #findEndCondition#
sqlMap.update: /* ID : bkLabel.setBkLabelUpdate */ UPDATE TB_SYS_BKLABEL SET LAST_WORKER = NULLIF(#lastWorker#, '') , STORE_PLACE = NULLIF(#storePlace#, '') , STORE_YEAR = NULLIF(#storeYear#, '') WHERE BK_LABEL_ID = #bkLabelId#
